HealthAdvisory: Very sensitive people should consider reducing longer/heavy exertion and heavy outdoor work
HealthRisk: Minor health issues for sensitive people, no problem to the general public

HealthAdvisory: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce longer or heavy exertion and outdoor activity
HealthRisk: Elderly at risk. Healthy people may start to experience slight discomfort.

HealthAdvisory: Everyone should reduce heavy exertion. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid longer or heavy exertion and outdoor activity.
HealthRisk: Triggers health alert. Everyone may experience health effects. Significant increase in respiratory problems.

HealthAdvisory: Everyone should avoid any outdoor physical activity. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children do not exert at all and remain indoor.
HealthRisk: Health warning of emergency conditions. Serious risk of respiratory effects even in the general public.
